Spaghetti Bolognese: Boil spaghetti. Cook ground beef in a saucepan and simmer with tomato sauce.
Grilled Cheese: Butter bread slices, add cheese, and grill until golden.
Chicken Salad: Cook chicken, chop lettuce and tomato, then mix together.
Veggie Stir Fry: Stir fry broccoli and carrot, add soy sauce, and cook until tender.
